channel.title: How would I stop players from attacking npcs like shop keepers?
channel.description:
How would I stop players from attacking npcs like shop keepers?
I tried to fix it but i can't seem to get it to work. Could someone tell me how?

item.title: How would I stop players from attacking npcs like shop keepers?
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

You would need to add a code to NPCHandler so that it won’t attack the NPC with the NPC with 0 HP as shown below;

HP = 3000 || HP = 0;

You would also need to edit packet 131, magic on NPCs

Read full topic
item.source: How would I stop players from attacking npcs like shop keepers?
